device_add.name: Manually add a plugwise device
device_add.description: Manually add a new plugwise device.

mac.name: MAC address
mac.description: The full 16 character MAC address of the plugwise device.

device_remove.name: Manually remove a plugwise device
device_remove.description: Remove and un-register specified device (MAC) from plugwise network.

mac.name: MAC address
mac.description: The full 16 character MAC address of the plugwise device.

configure_scan.name: Configure motion settings
configure_scan.description: Configure the motion settings for a Plugwise Scan device. The new configuration will be send soon as the Scan devices is awake to receive configuration changes. For quick activation press the local button to awake the device.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: Entity id of the Plugwise Scan motion sensor.

reset_timer.name: Timer reset
reset_timer.description: Number of minutes the Scan waits after no motion detected to set state back to off. Valid range is 1 minute up to 240 minutes (4 hours).

day_light.name: Daylight override
day_light.description: Daylight override to only report motion when light-level is below calibrated level.

configure_battery_savings.name: Configure battery savings
configure_battery_savings.description: Configure the battery saving settings for battery powered Plugwise devices. The new configuration will be sent soon as the Plugwise device notifies Home Assistant it is awake to receive configuration changes. For quick reception of the configuration press the local button to wake up the device manually.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: Entity id of the battery powered Plugwise device.

stay_active.name: Stay active
stay_active.description: Duration in seconds the device will be awake. A high value will drain the battery.

sleep_for.name: Sleep for
sleep_for.description: Duration in minutes the device will be in sleeping mode and not able to respond any command.

maintenance_interval.name: Maintenance interval
maintenance_interval.description: Interval in minutes the node will wake up and notify it is able to receive (maintenance) commands.

clock_sync.name: Clock-sync
clock_sync.description: Enable or disable the synchronization of the internal clock.

clock_interval.name: Clock-sync interval
clock_interval.description: Interval the device will synchronize its internal clock. Only useful if Clock-sync is set to True.
